attributes.action: Ignore Celebrities in the honours list and recognise real heros
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every year we hear about luvvies and celebs being rewarded for no good use. Next year, we need to recognise the likes of paramedics, who save lives literally daily,Soldiers who go over and above their duties.  We should honour only those that are worthy, not bankers, celebs and ministers.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
